==Chinese==

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|北|肉|alt2=月|c1=p|c2=s|ls=psc|t2=meat}}. Semantic {{lang|zh|肉}} was added to be distinguished from the derived meaning of {{lang|zh|北}} (“north”).

===Etymology===
Two pronunciations were distinguished in Middle Chinese: {{IPAchar|/puʌi<sup>H</sup>/}} (“back”), {{IPAchar|/buʌi<sup>H</sup>/}} (“to turn one's back to; to betray”).
